name: Chicken Fight (itch)
description:
Chicken Fight is a basic 2d version  of the battle mode from 'driven to destruction'.

Each player has 5 lives. You can ram your opponent or shoot exploding chickens to damage them. Playing with objects Enabled provides obstacles and cover however the collision handling is semi broken for these objects at this stage so you can remove them by on checking the box on the menu screen.

credits:
Car images - Matt Ward
Chicken image - Diarandor
Explosion sound - Partners in Rhyme
Battle music  - twist turn slide by Psychadelik Pedestrian
Everything else - Me or Public Domain with no creator reference
